description: Variation of Listed Building Consent reference P071777 in connection with planning permission reference P052245 (partial demolition, alteration, extension and change of use of building A, B, D, F and associated outbuildings and structures, to provide a mixed use scheme comprising residential (C3), Business (B1), Retail (A1, A2, A3 including relocation of Post Office counter), Leisure (D2) serviced apartments (temporary sleeping accommodation as defined by the Greater London Planning Act 1973) performance space, rehearsal space and theatre storage, with associated access, parking and landscaping).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, details of the proposed smoke vent to top of stairs which should include detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before the relevant part of the work is begun. Cutting thorugh historic timber roof structure shall be avoided.

 REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List.
